tika-vin05t12:1_1: rajatamāsakoti catubbidhaṁ nissaggiyavatthu. Tambalohādīhi kato lohamāsako. Sāradārunā
tika-vin05t12:1_2: vā veḷupesikāya vā antamaso tālapaṇṇenapi rūpaṁ chinditvā kato dārumāsako. Lākhāya
tika-vin05t12:1_3: vā niyyāsena vā rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpetvā kato jatumāsako. Yo yo yattha yattha janapade
tika-vin05t12:1_4: yadā yadā vohāraṁ gacchati, antamaso aṭṭhimayopi cammamayopi rukkhaphalabījamayopi
tika-vin05t12:1_5: samuṭṭhāpitarūpopi asamuṭṭhāpitarūpopīti ayaṁ sabbopi rajatamāsakeneva saṅgahito.
tika-vin05t12:1_6: Muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ lohitaṅko masāragallaṁ satta dhaññāni dāsidāsakhettavatthupupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti
tika-vin05t12:1_7: idaṁ dukkaṭavatthu. Tattha nissaggiyavatthuṁ attano vā saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyānaṁ
tika-vin05t12:1_8: vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṁ na vaṭṭati. Attano atthāya sampaṭicchato nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ
tika-vin05t12:1_9: hoti, sesānaṁ atthāya dukkaṭaṁ. Dukkaṭavatthuṁ sabbesampi atthāya sampaṭicchato dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t12:2_0: Tatrāyaṁ vinicchayo – sace koci jātarūparajataṁ āharitvā “idaṁ saṅghassa dammi, ārāmaṁ
tika-vin05t12:2_1: vā karotha cetiyaṁ vā bhojanasālādīnaṁ vā aññatara”nti vadati, idaṁ sampaṭicchituṁ
tika-vin05t12:2_2: na vaṭṭati. Sace pana “nayidaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sampaṭicchituṁ vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitte “vaḍḍhakīnaṁ
tika-vin05t12:2_3: vā kammakārānaṁ vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṁ tumhe sukatadukkaṭaṁ jānāthā”ti vatvā
tika-vin05t12:2_4: tesaṁ hatthe datvā pakkamati, vaṭṭati. Athāpi “mama manussānaṁ hatthe bhavissati,
tika-vin05t12:2_5: mayhameva vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṁ tumhe yaṁ yassa dātabbaṁ, tadatthāya pesethā”ti
tika-vin05t12:2_6: vadati, evampi vaṭṭati. Sace pana saṁghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā anāmasitvā “idaṁ
tika-vin05t12:2_7: hiraññasuvaṇṇaṁ cetiyassa dema, vihārassa dema, navakammassa demā”ti vadanti, paṭikkhipituṁ
tika-vin05t12:2_8: na vaṭṭati, “ime idaṁ bhaṇantī”ti kappiyakārakānaṁ ācikkhitabbaṁ. “Cetiyādīnaṁ atthāya
tika-vin05t12:2_9: tumhe gahetvā ṭhapetvā”ti vutte pana “amhākaṁ gahetuṁ na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:3_0: Sace pana koci bahuṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṁ ānetvā “idaṁ saṁghassa dammi, cattāro paccaye
tika-vin05t12:3_1: paribhuñjathā”ti vadati, tañce saṁgho sampaṭicchati, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpatti.
tika-vin05t12:3_2: Tatra ceko bhikkhu “nayidaṁ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, upāsako ca “yadina kappati,
tika-vin05t12:3_3: mayhameva bhavissatī”ti taṁ ādāya gacchati. So bhikkhu “tayā saṁghassa lābhantarāyo
tika-vin05t12:3_4: kato”ti na kenaci kiñci vattabbo. Yo hi taṁ codeti, sveva sāpattiko hoti. Tena panekena
tika-vin05t12:3_5: bahū anāpattikā katā. Sace pana bhikkhūhi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitte “kappiyakārakānaṁ
tika-vin05t12:3_6: vā hatthe bhavissati, mama purisānaṁ vā mayhaṁ vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṁ tumhe
tika-vin05t12:4_0: Catupaccayatthāya ca dinnaṁ yena yena paccayena attho hoti, taṁ tadatthaṁ upanetabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:4_1: Civaratthāya dinnaṁ cīvareyeva upanetabbaṁ. Sace cīvarena tādiso attho natthi, piṇḍapātādīhi
tika-vin05t12:4_2: saṁgho kilamati, saṁghasuṭṭhutāya apaloketvā tadatthāyapi upanetabbaṁ. Esa nayo piṇḍapātagilānapaccayatthāya
tika-vin05t12:4_3: dinnepi. Senāsanatthāya dinnaṁ pana senāsanassa garubhaṇḍattā senāsaneyeva upanetabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:4_4: Sace pana bhikkhūsu senāsanaṁ chaḍḍetvā gatesu senāsanaṁ vinassati, īdise kāle senāsanaṁ
tika-vin05t12:4_5: vissajjetvāpi bhikkhūnaṁ paribhogo anuññāto, tasmā senāsanajagganatthaṁ mūlacchejjaṁ
tika-vin05t12:5_0: 60. Sace koci “mayhaṁ tisassasampādanakaṁ mahātaḷākaṁ atthi, taṁ saṁghassa dammī”ti
tika-vin05t12:5_1: vadati, tañce saṁgho sampaṭicchati, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattiyeva. Yo pana
tika-vin05t12:5_2: taṁ paṭikkhipati, so purimanayeneva na kenaci kiñci vattabbo. Yo hi taṁ codeti, sveva
tika-vin05t12:5_3: sāpattiko hoti. Tena panekena bahū anāpattikā katā. Yo pana “tādisaṁyeva taḷākaṁ
tika-vin05t12:5_4: dammī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto vadati “asukañca asukañca saṅghassa
tika-vin05t12:5_5: taḷākaṁ atthi, taṁ kathaṁ vaṭṭatī”ti. So vattabbo “kappiyaṁ katvā dinnaṁ bhavissatī”ti.
tika-vin05t12:5_6: Kathaṁ dinnaṁ kappiyaṁ hotīti. “Cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā dinnanti.
tika-vin05t12:5_7: So sace “sādhu, bhante cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti deti, vaṭṭati. Athāpi “taḷākaṁ
tika-vin05t12:5_8: gaṇhathā”ti vatvā “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto “kappiyakārako atthī”ti pucchitvā “natthī”ti
tika-vin05t12:5_9: vutte “idaṁ asuko nāma vicāressati, asukassa vā hatthe mayhaṁ vā hatthe bhavissati,
tika-vin05t12:5_10: saṅgho kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ paribhuñjatū”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Sacepi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto
tika-vin05t12:5_11: “udakaṁ paribhuñjissati, bhaṇḍakaṁ dhovissati, migapakkhino pivissantī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t12:5_12: evampi vaṭṭati. Athāpi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto vadati “kappiyasīsena gaṇhathā”ti.
tika-vin05t12:5_13: “Sādhu upāsaka, saṅgho pānīyaṁ pivissati, bhaṇḍakaṁ dhovissati, migapakkhino pivissantī”ti
tika-vin05t12:5_14: vatvā paribhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati. Athāpi “mama taḷākaṁ vā pokkharaṇiṁ vā saṅghassa dammī”ti
tika-vin05t12:5_15: vutte “sādhu upāsaka, saṅgho pānīyaṁ pivissatī”tiādīni vatvā paribhuñjituṁ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t12:6_0: Yadi pana bhikkhūhi hatthakammaṁ yācitvā sahatthena ca kappiyapathaviṁ khaṇitvā udakaparibhogatthāya
tika-vin05t12:6_1: taḷākaṁ kāritaṁ hoti, tañce nissāya sassaṁ nipphādetvā manussā vihāre kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ
tika-vin05t12:6_2: denti, vaṭṭati. Atha manussā eva saṅghassa upakāratthāya saṅghikabhūmiṁ khaṇitvā
tika-vin05t12:6_3: taṁ nissāya nipphannasassato kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ denti, etampi vaṭṭati. “Amhākaṁ ekaṁ
tika-vin05t12:6_4: kappiyakārakaṁ ṭhapethā”ti vutte ca ṭhapetumpi labbhati. Atha te manussā rājabalinā
tika-vin05t12:6_5: upaddutā pakkamanti, aññe paṭipajjanti, na ca bhikkhūnaṁ kiñci denti, udakaṁ vāretuṁ
tika-vin05t12:6_6: labbhati, tañca kho kasikammakāleyeva, na sassakāle. Sace te vadanti “nanu, bhante,
tika-vin05t12:6_7: pubbepi manussā imaṁ nissāya sassaṁ akaṁsū”ti, tato vattabbā “te saṅghassa imañca
tika-vin05t12:6_8: imañca upakāraṁ akaṁsu, idañcidañca kappiyabhaṇḍakaṁ adaṁsū”ti. Sace te vadanti “mayampi
tika-vin05t12:7_0: Sace pana koci abyatto akappiyavohārena taḷākaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti vā kāreti vā, taṁ bhikkhūhi
tika-vin05t12:7_1: na paribhuñjitabbaṁ, taṁ nissāya laddhakappiyabhaṇḍampi akappiyameva. Sace bhikkhūhi
tika-vin05t12:7_2: pariccattabhāvaṁ ñatvā sāmiko vā tassa puttadhītaro vā añño vā koci vaṁse uppanno
tika-vin05t12:7_3: puna kappiyavohārena deti, vaṭṭati. Pacchinne kulavaṁse yo tassa janapadassa sāmiko,
tika-vin05t12:7_4: so acchinditvā kappiyavohārena puna deti cittalapabbate bhikkhunā nīhaṭaudakavāhakaṁ
tika-vin05t12:7_5: aḷanāgarājamahesī viya, evampi vaṭṭati. Kappiyavohārepi udakavasena paṭiggahitataḷāke
tika-vin05t12:7_6: suddhacittānaṁ mattikuddharaṇapāḷibandhanādīni ca kātuṁ vaṭṭati. Taṁ nissāya pana
tika-vin05t12:7_7: sassaṁ karonte disvā kappiyakārakaṁ ṭhapetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Yadi te sayameva kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ
tika-vin05t12:7_8: denti, gahetabbaṁ. No ce denti, na codetabbaṁ. Paccayavasena paṭiggahitataḷāke kappiyakārakaṁ
tika-vin05t12:7_9: ṭhapetuṁ vaṭṭati, mattikuddharaṇapāḷibandhanādīni kāretuṁ na vaṭṭati. Sace kappiyakārakā
tika-vin05t12:7_10: sayameva karonti, vaṭṭati. Abyattena pana lajjibhikkhunā kārāpitesu kiñcāpi paṭiggahaṇaṁ
tika-vin05t12:7_11: kappiyaṁ, bhikkhussa pana payogapaccayā uppannena missattā visagatapiṇḍapāto viya
tika-vin05t12:7_12: akappiyamaṁsarasamissabhojanaṁ viya ca dubbinibhogaṁ hoti, sabbesaṁ akappiyameva.
tika-vin05t12:8_0: 61. Sace pana udakassa okāso atthi, taḷākassa pāḷi thirā, “yathā bahuṁ udakaṁ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t12:8_1: evaṁ karohi, tīrasamīpe udakaṁ karohī”ti evaṁ udakameva vicāreti, vaṭṭati. Uddhane
tika-vin05t12:8_2: aggiṁ na pātenti, “udakakammaṁ labbhatu upāsakā”ti vattuṁ vaṭṭati, “sassaṁ katvā
tika-vin05t12:8_3: āharathā”ti vattuṁ pana na vaṭṭati. Sace pana taḷāke atibahuṁ udakaṁ disvā passato
tika-vin05t12:8_4: vā piṭṭhito vā mātikaṁ nīharāpeti, vanaṁ chindāpetvā kedāre kārāpeti, porāṇakedāresu
tika-vin05t12:8_5: vā pakatibhāgaṁ aggahetvā atirekaṁ gaṇhāti, navasasse vā aparicchinnabhāge “ettake
tika-vin05t12:8_6: kahāpaṇe dethā”ti kahāpaṇe uṭṭhāpeti, sabbesaṁ akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:9_0: Yo pana “kasatha vapathā”ti avatvā “ettakāya bhūmiyā ettako nāma bhāgo”ti evaṁ bhūmiṁ
tika-vin05t12:9_1: vā patiṭṭhāpeti, “ettake bhūmibhāge amhehi sassaṁ kataṁ, ettakaṁ nāma bhāgaṁ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin05t12:9_2: vadantesu kassakesu bhūmippamāṇagahaṇatthaṁ rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vā mināti, khale vā
tika-vin05t12:9_3: ṭhatvā rakkhati, khalato vā nīharāpeti, koṭṭhāgāre vā paṭisāmeti, tasseva taṁ akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:9_4: Sace kassakā kahāpaṇe āharitvā “ime saṅghassa āhaṭā”ti vadanti, aññataro ca bhikkhu
tika-vin05t12:9_5: “na saṅgho kahāpaṇe khādatī”ti saññāya “ettakehi kahāpaṇehi sāṭake āharatha, ettakehi
tika-vin05t12:9_6: yāguādīni sampādethā”ti vadati, yaṁ te āharanti, taṁ sabbesaṁ akappiyaṁ. Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṁ
tika-vin05t12:9_7: vicāritattā. Sace dhaññaṁ āharitvā “idaṁ saṅghassa āhaṭa”nti vadanti, aññataro ca
tika-vin05t12:9_8: bhikkhu purimanayeneva “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati, yaṁ te āharanti,
tika-vin05t12:9_9: taṁ tasseva akappiyaṁ. Kasmā? Dhaññassa vicāritattā. Sace taṇḍulaṁ vā aparaṇṇaṁ vā
tika-vin05t12:9_10: āharitvā “idaṁ saṅghassa āhaṭa”nti vadanti, aññataro ca bhikkhu purimanayeneva “ettakehi
tika-vin05t12:9_11: taṇḍulehi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati, yaṁ te āharanti, taṁ sabbesaṁ kappiyaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:9_12: Kasmā? Kappiyānaṁ taṇḍulādīnaṁ vicāritattā. Kayavikkayepi anāpatti kappiyakārakassa ācikkhitattā.
tika-vin05t12:10_0: 62. Pubbe pana cittalapabbate eko bhikkhu catusāladvāre “aho vata sve saṅghassa ettakappamāṇe
tika-vin05t12:10_1: pūve paceyyu”nti ārāmikānaṁ saññājananatthaṁ bhūmiyaṁ maṇḍalaṁ akāsi. Taṁ disvā cheko
tika-vin05t12:10_2: ārāmiko tatheva katvā dutiyadivase bheriyā ākoṭitāya sannipatite saṅghe pūvaṁ gahetvā
tika-vin05t12:10_3: saṅghattheraṁ āha – “bhante, amhehi ito pubbe neva pitūnaṁ, na pitāmahānaṁ evarūpaṁ
tika-vin05t12:10_4: sutapubbaṁ, ekena ayyena catusāladvāre pūvatthāya saññā katā, ito dāni pabhuti ayyā
tika-vin05t12:10_5: attano attano cittānurūpaṁ vadantu, amhākampi phāsuvihāro bhavissatī”ti. Mahāthero
tika-vin05t12:10_6: tatova nivatti, ekabhikkhunāpi pūvo na gahito. Evaṁ pubbe tatruppādaṁ na paribhuñjiṁsu. Tasmā –
tika-vin05t12:13: Yo cāyaṁ taḷāke vutto, pokkharaṇīudakavāhakamātikādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t12:14_0: 63. Pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaucchuphalāphalādīnaṁ viruhanaṭṭhānaṁ yaṁ kiñci khettaṁ vā vatthuṁ
tika-vin05t12:14_1: vā “dammī”ti vuttepi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā taḷāke vuttanayeneva yadā kappiyavohārena
tika-vin05t12:14_3: araññaṁ dammī”ti vutte pana vaṭṭati. Sace manussā bhikkhūhi anāṇattāyeva tattha rukkhe
tika-vin05t12:14_4: chinditvā aparaṇṇādīni sampādetvā bhikkhūnaṁ bhāgaṁ denti, vaṭṭati, adentā na codetabbā.
tika-vin05t12:14_5: Sace kenacideva antarāyena tesu pakkantesu aññe karonti, na ca bhikkhūnaṁ kiñci denti,
tika-vin05t12:14_6: te vāretabbā. Sace vadanti “nanu, bhante, pubbe manussā idha sassāni akaṁsū”ti, tato
tika-vin05t12:14_7: vattabbā “te saṅghassa idañcidañca kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ adaṁsū”ti. Sace vadanti “mayampi
tika-vin05t12:15_0: Kiñci sassuṭṭhānakaṁ bhūmippadesaṁ sandhāya “sīmaṁ demā”ti vadanti, vaṭṭati. Sīmaparicchedanatthaṁ
tika-vin05t12:15_1: pana thambhā vā pāsāṇā vā sayaṁ na ṭhapetabbā, bhūmi nāma anagghā, appakenapi pārājiko
tika-vin05t12:15_2: bhaveyya. Ārāmikānaṁ pana vattabbaṁ “iminā ṭhānena amhākaṁ sīmā gatā”ti. Sacepi hi
tika-vin05t12:15_3: te adhikaṁ gaṇhanti, pariyāyena kathitattā anāpatti. Yadi pana rājarājamahāmattādayo
tika-vin05t12:15_4: sayameva thambhe ṭhapāpetvā “cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti denti, vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t12:16_0: Sace koci antosīmāyaṁ taḷākaṁ vā khaṇati, vihāramajjhena vā mātikaṁ neti, cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇādīni
tika-vin05t12:16_1: dussanti, vāretabbo. Sace saṅgho kiñci labhitvā āmisagarukatāya na vāreti, eko bhikkhu
tika-vin05t12:16_2: vāreti, sova bhikkhu issaro. Sace eko bhikkhu na vāreti “netha tumhe”ti, tesaṁyeva
tika-vin05t12:16_3: pakkho hoti. Saṅgho vāreti, saṅghova issaro. Saṅghikesu hi kammesu yo dhammakammaṁ
tika-vin05t12:16_4: karoti, sova issaro. Sace vāriyamānopi karoti, heṭṭhā gahitaṁ paṁsuṁ heṭṭhā pakkhipitvā,
tika-vin05t12:16_5: upari gahitaṁ paṁsuṁ upari pakkhipitvā pūretabbā.
tika-vin05t12:17_0: Sace koci yathājātameva ucchuṁ vā aparaṇṇaṁ vā alābukumbhaṇḍādikaṁ vā valliphalaṁ
tika-vin05t12:17_1: dātukāmo “etaṁ sabbaṁ ucchukhettaṁ aparaṇṇavatthuṁ valliphalāvāṭaṁ dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t12:17_2: saha vatthunā parāmaṭṭhattā na vaṭṭatīti mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero pana
tika-vin05t12:17_3: “abhilāpamattametaṁ, sāmikānaṁyeva hi so bhūmibhāgo, tasmā vaṭṭatī”ti āha. “Dāsaṁ
tika-vin05t12:17_4: dammī”ti vadati, na vaṭṭati. “Ārāmikaṁ dammi, veyyāvaccakaraṁ dammi, kappiyakārakaṁ
tika-vin05t12:17_5: dammī”ti vutte vaṭṭati. Sace ārāmiko purebhattampi pacchābhattampi saṅghasseva kammaṁ
tika-vin05t12:17_6: karoti, sāmaṇerassa viya sabbaṁ bhesajjaṁ paṭijagganampi tassa kātabbaṁ. Sace purebhattameva
tika-vin05t12:17_7: saṅghassa kammaṁ karoti, pacchābhattaṁ attano karoti, sāyaṁ nivāpo na dātabbo. Yepi
tika-vin05t12:17_8: pañcadivasavārena vā pakkhavārena vā saṅghassa kammaṁ katvā sesakāle attano kammaṁ
tika-vin05t12:17_9: karonti, tesampi karaṇakāleyeva bhattañca nivāpo ca dātabbo. Sace saṅghassa kammaṁ
tika-vin05t12:17_10: natthi, attanoyeva kammaṁ katvā jīvanti, te ce hatthakammamūlaṁ ānetvā denti, gahetabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:17_11: No ce denti, na kiñci vattabbā. Yaṁ kiñci rajakadāsampi pesakāradāsampi ārāmikanāmena
tika-vin05t12:18_0: Sace “gāvo demā”ti vadanti, “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbā. Imā gāvo kutoti. Paṇḍitehi
tika-vin05t12:18_2: vaṭṭanti. Ajikādīsupi eseva nayo. “Hatthiṁ dema, assaṁ, mahiṁsaṁ, kukkuṭaṁ, sūkaraṁ
tika-vin05t12:18_3: demā”ti vadanti, sampaṭicchituṁ na vaṭṭati. Sace keci manussā “appossukkā, bhante,
tika-vin05t12:18_4: tumhe hotha, mayaṁ ime gahetvā tumhākaṁ kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ dassāmā”ti gaṇhanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t12:18_5: Kukkuṭasūkare “sukhaṁ jīvantū”ti araññe vissajjāpetuṁ vaṭṭati. “Imaṁ taḷākaṁ, imaṁ
tika-vin05t12:18_6: khettaṁ, imaṁ vatthuṁ vihārassa demā”ti vutte paṭikkhipituṁ na labbhati.
tika-vin05t12:19_0: 64. Sace koci bhikkhuṁ uddissa dūtena hiraññasuvaṇṇādicīvaracetāpannaṁ pahiṇeyya
tika-vin05t12:19_1: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṁ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ cīvarena acchādehī”ti,
tika-vin05t12:19_2: so ce dūto taṁ bhikkhuṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyya “idaṁ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṁ
tika-vin05t12:19_3: uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṁ ābhataṁ, paṭiggaṇhatu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti, tena bhikkhunā
tika-vin05t12:19_4: so dūto evamassa vacanīyo “na kho mayaṁ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma, cīvarañca
tika-vin05t12:19_5: kho mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti. So ce dūto taṁ bhikkhuṁ evaṁ vadeyya “atthi
tika-vin05t12:19_6: panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti, cīvaratthikena bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo
tika-vin05t12:19_7: ārāmiko vā upāsako vā “eso kho, āvuso, bhikkhūnaṁ veyyāvaccakaro”ti. Na vattabbo
tika-vin05t12:19_8: “tassa dehī”ti vā “so vā nikkhipissati, so vā parivattessati, so vā cetāpessatī”ti.
tika-vin05t12:19_9: So ce dūto taṁ veyyāvaccakaraṁ saññāpetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyya
tika-vin05t12:19_10: “yaṁ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṁ niddisi, āṇatto so mayā, upasaṅkamatu āyasmā
tika-vin05t12:19_11: kālena, cīvarena taṁ acchādessatī”ti. Cīvaratthikena bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin05t12:19_12: dvattikkhattuṁ codetabbo sāretabbo “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti. Na vattabbo “dehi
tika-vin05t12:19_13: me cīvaraṁ, āhara me cīvaraṁ, parivattehi me cīvaraṁ, cetāpehi me cīvara”nti. Sace
tika-vin05t12:19_14: dvattikkhattuṁ codayamāno sārayamāno taṁ cīvaraṁ abhinipphādeti, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:19_15: No ce abhinipphādeti, tattha gantvā catukkhattuṁ pañcakkhattuṁ chakkhattuparamaṁ
tika-vin05t12:19_16: tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṁ, na āsane nisīditabbaṁ, na āmisaṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ,
tika-vin05t12:19_17: na dhammo bhāsitabbo. “Kiṁ kāraṇā āgatosī”ti pucchiyamānena “jānāhi, āvuso”ti ettakameva vattabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:20_0: Sace āsane vā nisīdati, āmisaṁ vā paṭiggaṇhāti, dhammaṁ vā bhāsati, ṭhānaṁ bhañjati.
tika-vin05t12:20_1: Sace catukkhattuṁ codeti, catukkhattuṁ ṭhātabbaṁ. Pañcakkhattuṁ codeti, dvikkhattuṁ
tika-vin05t12:20_2: ṭhātabbaṁ. Chakkhattuṁ codeti, na ṭhātabbaṁ. Ekāya hi codanāya ṭhānadvayaṁ bhañjati.
tika-vin05t12:20_3: Yathā chakkhattuṁ codetvā na ṭhātabbaṁ, evaṁ dvādasakkhattuṁ ṭhatvā na codetabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:20_4: Tasmā sace codetiyeva na tiṭṭhati, cha codanā labbhanti. Sace tiṭṭhatiyeva na codeti,
tika-vin05t12:20_5: dvādasa ṭhānāni labbhanti. Sace codetipi tiṭṭhatipi, ekāya codanāya dve ṭhānāni hāpetabbāni.
tika-vin05t12:20_6: Tattha yo ekadivasameva punappunaṁ gantvā chakkhattuṁ codeti, sakiṁyeva vā gantvā
tika-vin05t12:20_7: “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti chakkhattuṁ vadati, tattha ekadivasameva punappunaṁ
tika-vin05t12:20_8: gantvā dvādasakkhattuṁ tiṭṭhati, sakimeva vā gantvā tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhati, sopi
tika-vin05t12:20_9: sabbacodanāyo sabbaṭṭhānāni ca bhañjati, ko pana vādo nānādivasesu. Tato ce uttari
tika-vin05t12:20_10: vāyamamāno taṁ cīvaraṁ abhinipphādeti, payoge dukkaṭaṁ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṁ hoti.
tika-vin05t12:20_11: No ce sakkoti taṁ abhinipphādetuṁ, yato rājato rājamahāmattato vā assa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t12:20_12: taṁ cīvaracetāpannaṁ ānītaṁ, tassa santikaṁ sāmaṁ vā gantabbaṁ, dūto vā pāhetabbo
tika-vin05t12:20_13: “yaṁ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuṁ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṁ pahiṇittha, na taṁ tassa
tika-vin05t12:20_14: bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṁ anubhoti, yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṁ, mā tumhākaṁ santakaṁ vinassatū”ti.
tika-vin05t12:20_15: Ayaṁ tattha sāmīci. Yo pana neva sāmaṁ gacchati, na dūtaṁ pāheti, vattabhede dukkaṭaṁ āpajjati.
tika-vin05t12:21_0: 65. Kiṁ pana sabbakappiyakārakesu evaṁ paṭipajjitabbanti? Na paṭipajjitabbaṁ. Ayañhi
tika-vin05t12:21_1: kappiyakārako nāma saṅkhepato duvidho niddiṭṭho aniddiṭṭho ca. Tattha niddiṭṭho duvidho
tika-vin05t12:21_2: bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho dūtena niddiṭṭhoti. Aniddiṭṭhopi duvidho mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako
tika-vin05t12:21_3: parammukhakappiyakārakoti. Tesu bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho sammukhāsammukhavasena catubbidho
tika-vin05t12:21_4: hoti, tathā dūtena niddiṭṭhopi. Kathaṁ? Idhekacco bhikkhussa cīvaratthāya dūtena
tika-vin05t12:21_5: akappiyavatthuṁ pahiṇati, dūto taṁ bhikkhuṁ upasaṅkamitvā “idaṁ, bhante, itthannāmena
tika-vin05t12:21_6: tumhākaṁ cīvaratthāya pahitaṁ, gaṇhatha na”nti vadati, bhikkhu “nayidaṁ kappatī”ti
tika-vin05t12:21_7: paṭikkhipati, dūto “atthi pana te, bhante, veyyāvaccakaro”ti pucchati, puññatthikehi
tika-vin05t12:21_8: ca upāsakehi “bhikkhūnaṁ veyyāvaccaṁ karothā”ti āṇattā vā, bhikkhūnaṁ vā sandiṭṭhasambhattā
tika-vin05t12:21_9: keci veyyāvaccakarā honti, tesaṁ aññataro tasmiṁ khaṇe bhikkhussa santike nisinno
tika-vin05t12:21_10: hoti, bhikkhu taṁ niddisati “ayaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ veyyāvaccakaro”ti, dūto tassa hatthe
tika-vin05t12:21_11: akappiyavatthuṁ datvā “therassa cīvaraṁ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati, ayaṁ bhikkhunā sammukhāniddiṭṭho.
tika-vin05t12:22_0: No ce bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti, apica kho bhikkhu niddisati “asukasmiṁ nāma
tika-vin05t12:22_1: gāme itthannāmo bhikkhūnaṁ veyyāvaccakaro”ti, so gantvā tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṁ
tika-vin05t12:22_2: datvā “therassa cīvaraṁ kiṇitvā dadeyyāsī”ti āgantvā bhikkhussa ārocetvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t12:23_0: Na heva kho so dūto attanā āgantvā āroceti, apica kho aññaṁ pahiṇati “dinnaṁ mayā,
tika-vin05t12:23_1: bhante, tassa hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṁ, tumhe cīvaraṁ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṁ dutiyo
tika-vin05t12:24_0: Na heva kho aññaṁ pahiṇati, apica gacchantova bhikkhuṁ vadati “ahaṁ tassa hatthe
tika-vin05t12:24_1: cīvaracetāpannaṁ dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṁ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṁ tatiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin05t12:24_2: evaṁ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā
tika-vin05t12:25_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito natthitāya vā avicāretukāmatāya vā “natthamhākaṁ
tika-vin05t12:25_1: kappiyakārako”ti vadati, tasmiṁ khaṇe koci manusso āgacchati, dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṁ
tika-vin05t12:25_2: datvā “imassa hatthato cīvaraṁ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā gacchati, ayaṁ dūtena sammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin05t12:26_0: Aparo dūto gāmaṁ pavisitvā attanā abhirucitassa kassaci hatthe akappiyavatthuṁ datvā
tika-vin05t12:26_1: purimanayeneva āgantvā vā āroceti, aññaṁ vā pahiṇati “ahaṁ asukassa nāma hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṁ
tika-vin05t12:26_2: dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṁ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā vā gacchati, ayaṁ tatiyo dūtena asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin05t12:26_3: evaṁ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro dūtena niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā
tika-vin05t12:26_4: nāma. Etesu meṇḍakasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ –
tika-vin05t12:27_0: “Santi, bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, te kappiyakārakānaṁ hatthe hiraññaṁ upanikkhipanti
tika-vin05t12:27_1: ‘iminā yaṁ ayyassa kappiyaṁ, taṁ dethā’ti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṁ tato kappiyaṁ,
tika-vin05t12:27_2: taṁ sādituṁ, na tvevāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ‘kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṁ sāditabbaṁ
tika-vin05t12:28_0: Ettha codanāya parimāṇaṁ natthi, mūlaṁ asādiyantena sahassakkhattumpi codanāya vā
tika-vin05t12:28_1: ṭhānena vā kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ sādituṁ vaṭṭati. No ce deti, aññaṁ kappiyakārakaṁ ṭhapetvāpi
tika-vin05t12:28_2: āharāpetabbaṁ. Sace icchati, mūlasāmikānampi kathetabbaṁ. No ce icchati, na kathetabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:29_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito “natthamhākaṁ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t12:29_1: tadañño samīpe ṭhito sutvā “āhara bho, ahaṁ ayyassa cīvaraṁ cetāpetvā dassāmī”ti
tika-vin05t12:29_2: vadati. Dūto “handa bho dadeyyāsī”ti tassa hatthe datvā bhikkhussa anārocetvāva gacchati,
tika-vin05t12:29_3: ayaṁ mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako. Aparo bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākassa vā aññassa vā hatthe
tika-vin05t12:29_4: akappiyavatthuṁ datvā “therassa cīvaraṁ dadeyyāsī”ti ettova pakkamati, ayaṁ parammukhākappiyakārakoti
tika-vin05t12:29_5: ime dve aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakā nāma. Etesu aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:29_6: Sace sayameva cīvaraṁ ānetvā dadanti, gahetabbaṁ. No ce, na kiñci vattabbā. Yathā
tika-vin05t12:29_7: ca dūtassa hatthe cīvaratthāya akappiyavatthumhi pesite vinicchayo vutto, evaṁ piṇḍapātādīnampi
tika-vin05t12:29_8: atthāya pesite sayaṁ āgantvā dīyamāne ca vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t12:30_0: 66. Upanikkhittasādiyane pana ayaṁ vinicchayo – kiñci akappiyavatthuṁ pādamūle ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t12:30_1: “idaṁ ayyassa hotū”ti vutte sacepi cittena sādiyati, gaṇhitukāmo hoti, kāyena vā
tika-vin05t12:30_2: vācāya vā “nayidaṁ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, anāpatti. Kāyavācāhi vā appaṭikkhipitvāpi
tika-vin05t12:30_3: suddhacitto hutvā “nayidaṁ amhākaṁ kappatī”ti na sādiyati, anāpattiyeva. Tīsu dvāresu
tika-vin05t12:30_4: hi yena kenaci paṭikkhittaṁ paṭikkhittameva hoti. Sace pana kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t12:30_5: cittena adhivāseti, kāyavācāhi kattabbassa paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṁ
tika-vin05t12:30_6: kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca āpattiṁ āpajjati, manodvāre pana āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t12:31_0: Eko sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā pādamūle ṭhapeti “tuyhidaṁ hotū”ti, bhikkhu “nayidaṁ kappatī”ti
tika-vin05t12:31_1: paṭikkhipati, upāsako “pariccattaṁ mayā tumhāka”nti gato, añño tattha āgantvā pucchati
tika-vin05t12:31_2: “kiṁ, bhante, ida”nti, yaṁ tena ca attanā ca vuttaṁ, taṁ ācikkhitabbaṁ. So ce vadati
tika-vin05t12:31_3: “gopayissāmahaṁ, bhante, guttaṭṭhānaṁ dassethā”ti, sattabhūmikampi pāsādaṁ abhiruhitvā
tika-vin05t12:31_4: “idaṁ guttaṭṭhāna”nti ācikkhitabbaṁ, “idha nikkhipāhī”ti na vattabbaṁ. Ettāvatā kappiyañca
tika-vin05t12:31_5: akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṁ hoti, dvāraṁ pidahitvā rakkhantena vasitabbaṁ. Sace kiñci
tika-vin05t12:31_6: vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṁ pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā gahetvā āgacchati, “idaṁ gahessatha, bhante”ti
tika-vin05t12:31_7: vutte “upāsaka, atthi amhākaṁ iminā attho, vatthu ca evarūpaṁ nāma saṁvijjati, kappiyakārako
tika-vin05t12:31_8: natthī”ti vattabbaṁ. Sace so vadati “ahaṁ kappiyakārako bhavissāmi, dvāraṁ vivaritvā
tika-vin05t12:31_9: dethā”ti, dvāraṁ vivaritvā “imasmiṁ okāse ṭhapita”nti vattabbaṁ, “idaṁ gaṇhā”ti na
tika-vin05t12:31_10: vattabbaṁ. Evampi kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti. So ce taṁ gahetvā
tika-vin05t12:31_11: tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṁ deti, vaṭṭati. Sace adhikaṁ gaṇhāti, “na mayaṁ tava bhaṇḍaṁ
tika-vin05t12:32_0: 67. Yena pana jātarūpādicatubbidhaṁ nissaggiyavatthu paṭiggahitaṁ, tena kiṁ kātabbanti?
tika-vin05t12:32_1: Saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbaṁ. Kathaṁ? Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ
tika-vin05t12:32_2: uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ
tika-vin05t12:32_3: paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “ahaṁ, bhante, rūpiyaṁ paṭiggahesiṁ, idaṁ me nissaggiyaṁ,
tika-vin05t12:32_4: imāhaṁ nissajjāmī”ti nissajjitvā āpatti desetabbā. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena
tika-vin05t12:32_5: āpatti paṭiggahetabbā. Sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā upāsako vā, so vattabbo “āvuso,
tika-vin05t12:32_6: idaṁ jānāhī”ti. Sace so bhaṇati “iminā kiṁ āharissāmī”ti, na vattabbo “imaṁ vā imaṁ
tika-vin05t12:32_7: vā āharā”ti, kappiyaṁ ācikkhitabbaṁ sappiṁ vā telaṁ vā madhuṁ vā phāṇitaṁ vā. Ācikkhantena
tika-vin05t12:32_8: ca “iminā sappiṁ vā telaṁ vā madhuṁ vā phāṇitaṁ vā āharā”ti na vattabbaṁ, “idañcidañca
tika-vin05t12:32_9: saṅghassa kappiya”nti ettakameva vattabbaṁ. Sace so tena parivattetvā kappiyaṁ āharati,
tika-vin05t12:32_10: rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṁ ṭhapetvā sabbeheva bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṁ, rūpiyapaṭiggāhakena bhāgo na gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t12:33_0: Aññesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vā ārāmikānaṁ vā pattabhāgampi labhitvā paribhuñjituṁ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t12:33_1: antamaso makkaṭādīhi tato haritvā araññe ṭhapitaṁ vā tesaṁ hatthato gaḷitaṁ vā tiracchānapaṭiggahitampi
tika-vin05t12:33_2: paṁsukūlampi na vaṭṭatiyeva. Tato āhaṭena phāṇitena senāsanadhūpanampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t12:33_3: Sappinā vā telena vā padīpaṁ katvā dīpāloke nipajjituṁ, kasiṇaparikammaṁ kātuṁ, potthakampi
tika-vin05t12:33_4: vācetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Telamadhuphāṇitehi pana sarīre vaṇaṁ makkhetuṁ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t12:33_5: Tena vatthunā mañcapīṭhādīni vā gaṇhanti, uposathāgāraṁ vā bhojanasālaṁ vā karonti,
tika-vin05t12:33_6: paribhuñjituṁ na vaṭṭati. Chāyāpi gehaparicchedena ṭhitāva na vaṭṭati, paricchedātikkantā
tika-vin05t12:33_7: āgantukattā vaṭṭati. Taṁ vatthuṁ vissajjetvā katena maggenapi setunāpi nāvāyapi uḷumpenāpi
tika-vin05t12:33_8: gantuṁ na vaṭṭati. Tena vatthunā khaṇāpitāya pokkharaṇiyā ubbhidodakaṁ pātuṁ vā paribhuñjituṁ
tika-vin05t12:33_9: vā na vaṭṭati. Anto udake pana asati aññaṁ āgantukaṁ udakaṁ vā vassodakaṁ vā paviṭṭhaṁ
tika-vin05t12:33_10: vaṭṭati. Kītāya yena saddhiṁ kītā, taṁ āgantukampi na vaṭṭati. Taṁ vatthuṁ upanikkhepaṁ
tika-vin05t12:33_11: ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati, tepi paccayā tassa na vaṭṭanti. Ārāmo gahito
tika-vin05t12:33_12: hoti, sopi paribhuñjituṁ na vaṭṭati. Yadi bhūmipi bījampi akappiyaṁ, neva bhūmiṁ,
tika-vin05t12:33_13: na phalaṁ paribhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati. Sace bhūmiṁyeva kiṇitvā aññāni bījāni ropitāni,
tika-vin05t12:33_14: phalaṁ vaṭṭati. Atha bījāni kiṇitvā kappiyabhūmiyaṁ ropitāni, phalaṁ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t12:33_15: bhūmiyaṁ nisīdituṁ vā nipajjituṁ vā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t12:34_0: Sace pana tattha āgato kappiyakārako taṁ parivattetvā saṅghassa kappiyaṁ sappitelādiṁ
tika-vin05t12:34_1: āharituṁ na jānāti, so vattabbo “āvuso, imaṁ chaḍḍehī”ti. Sace so chaḍḍeti, iccetaṁ
tika-vin05t12:34_2: kusalaṁ. No ce chaḍḍeti, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako sammannitabbo
tika-vin05t12:34_3: yo na chandāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṁ
tika-vin05t12:34_4: gaccheyya, chaḍḍitāchaḍḍitañca jāneyya. Evañca pana sammannitabbo, paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu
tika-vin05t12:34_5: yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin05t12:35_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ
tika-vin05t12:35_1: rūpiyachaḍḍakaṁ sammanneyya, esā ñatti. Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ
tika-vin05t12:35_2: bhikkhuṁ rūpiyachaḍḍakaṁ sammannati, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t12:35_3: rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya. Sammato saṅghena
tika-vin05t12:35_4: itthannāmo bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t12:36_0: 68. Tena sammatena bhikkhunā nimittaṁ akatvā akkhīni nimīletvā nadiyā vā papāte vā
tika-vin05t12:36_1: vanagahane vā gūthaṁ viya anapekkhena patitokāsaṁ asamannārahantena chaḍḍetabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t12:36_2: Sace nimittaṁ katvā pāteti, dukkaṭaṁ āpajjati. Evaṁ jigucchitabbepi rūpiye bhagavā
tika-vin05t12:36_3: pariyāyena bhikkhūnaṁ paribhogaṁ ācikkhi. Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa pana kenaci pariyāyena
tika-vin05t12:36_4: tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na vaṭṭati. Yathā cāyaṁ etassa na vaṭṭati, evaṁ asantasambhāvanāya
tika-vin05t12:36_5: vā kuladūsakakammena vā kuhanādīhi vāuppannapaccayā neva tassa, na aññassa vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t12:36_6: dhammena samena uppannāpi apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṁ na vaṭṭanti. Cattāro hi paribhogā
tika-vin05t12:36_7: – theyyaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo sāmiparibhogoti. Tattha saṅghamajjhepi
tika-vin05t12:36_8: nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma. Sīlavato apaccavekkhitaparibhogo
tika-vin05t12:36_9: iṇaparibhogo nāma. Tasmā cīvaraṁ paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṁ, piṇḍapāto
tika-vin05t12:36_11: Sacassa apaccavekkhato aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Senāsanampi
tika-vin05t12:36_12: paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṁ. Bhesajjassa paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi satipaccayatā
tika-vin05t12:36_13: vaṭṭati, evaṁ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṁ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti, paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin05t12:36_14: pana satiṁ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti. Catubbidhā hi suddhi – desanāsuddhi
tika-vin05t12:37_0: Tattha desanāsuddhi nāma pātimokkhasaṁvarasīlaṁ. Tañhi desanāya sujjhanato “desanāsuddhī”ti
tika-vin05t12:37_1: vuccati. Saṁvarasuddhi nāma indriyasaṁvarasīlaṁ. Tañhi “na punevaṁ karissāmī”ti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṁvareneva
tika-vin05t12:37_3: Tañhi anesanaṁ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā
tika-vin05t12:37_5: Tañhi “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṁ paṭisevāmī”tiādinā nayena vuttena paccavekkhaṇena
tika-vin05t12:37_6: sujjhanato “paccavekkhaṇasuddhī”ti vuccati, tena vuttaṁ “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṁ akatvā
tika-vin05t12:38_0: Sattannaṁ sekkhānaṁ paccayaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo nāma. Te hi bhagavato puttā,
tika-vin05t12:38_1: tasmā pitusantakānaṁ paccayānaṁ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti. Kiṁ pana te
tika-vin05t12:38_2: bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti, gihīnaṁ paccaye paribhuñjantīti? Gihīhi dinnāpi
tika-vin05t12:38_3: bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti, tasmā bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjantīti
tika-vin05t12:38_4: veditabbaṁ. Dhammadāyādasutta ñcettha sādhakaṁ. Khīṇāsavānaṁ paribhogo sāmiparibhogo
tika-vin05t12:38_5: nāma. Te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṁ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjanti. Iti imesu paribhogesu
tika-vin05t12:38_6: sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesampi vaṭṭati, iṇaparibhogo na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t12:39_0: Aparepi cattāro paribhogā – lajjiparibhogo alajjiparibhogo dhammiyaparibhogo adhammiyaparibhogoti.
tika-vin05t12:39_1: Tattha alajjino lajjinā saddhiṁ paribhogo vaṭṭati, āpattiyā na kāretabbo. Lajjino
tika-vin05t12:39_2: alajjinā saddhiṁ yāva na jānāti, tāva vaṭṭati. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthi,
tika-vin05t12:39_3: tasmā yadāssa alajjibhāvaṁ jānāti, tadā vattabbo “tumhe kāyadvāre vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṁ
tika-vin05t12:39_4: karotha, taṁ appatirūpaṁ, mā evamakatthā”ti. Sace anādiyitvā karotiyeva, yadi tena
tika-vin05t12:39_5: saddhiṁ paribhogaṁ karoti, sopi alajjīyeva hoti. Yopi attano bhārabhūtena alajjinā
tika-vin05t12:39_6: saddhiṁ paribhogaṁ karoti, sopi nivāretabbo. Sace na oramati, ayampi alajjīyeva hoti.
tika-vin05t12:39_7: Evaṁ eko alajjī alajjisatampi karoti. Alajjino pana alajjināva saddhiṁ paribhoge
tika-vin05t12:39_8: āpatti nāma natthi. Lajjino lajjinā saddhiṁ paribhogo dvinnaṁ khattiyakumārānaṁ suvaṇṇapātiyaṁ
tika-vin05t12:39_9: bhojanasadiso. Dhammiyādhammiyaparibhogo paccayavaseneva veditabbo. Tattha sace puggalopi
tika-vin05t12:39_10: alajjī, piṇḍapātopi adhammiyo, ubho jegucchā. Puggalo alajjī, piṇḍapāto dhammiyo,
tika-vin05t12:39_11: puggalaṁ jigucchitvā piṇḍapāto na gahetabbo. Mahāpaccariyaṁ pana “dussīlo saṅghato
tika-vin05t12:39_12: uddesabhattādīni labhitvā saṅghasseva deti, etāni yathādānameva gahitattā vaṭṭantī”ti
tika-vin05t12:39_13: vuttaṁ. Puggalo lajjī, piṇḍapāto adhammiyo, piṇḍapāto jeguccho na gahetabbo. Puggalo
tika-vin05t12:40_0: Apare dve paggahā dve ca paribhogā – lajjipaggaho alajjipaggaho, dhammaparibhogo
tika-vin05t12:40_1: āmisaparibhogoti. Tattha alajjino lajjiṁ paggahetuṁ vaṭṭati, na so āpattiyā kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t12:40_2: Sace pana lajjī alajjiṁ paggaṇhāti, anumodanāya ajjhesati, dhammakathāya ajjhesati,
tika-vin05t12:40_3: kulesu upatthambheti, itaropi “amhākaṁ ācariyo īdiso ca īdiso cā”ti tassa parisati
tika-vin05t12:40_4: vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, ayaṁ sāsanaṁ osakkāpeti antaradhāpetīti veditabbo. Dhammaparibhogaāmisaparibhogesu
tika-vin05t12:40_5: pana yattha āmisaparibhogo vaṭṭati, dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭati. Yo pana koṭiyaṁ
tika-vin05t12:40_6: ṭhito, gantho tassa puggalassa accayena nassissati, taṁ dhammānuggahena uggaṇhituṁ
tika-vin05t12:40_7: vaṭṭatīti vuttaṁ. Tatridaṁ vatthu – mahābhaye kira ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso
tika-vin05t12:40_8: paguṇo ahosi. Atha catunikāyikatissattherassa upajjhāyo mahātipiṭakatthero nāma mahārakkhitattheraṁ
tika-vin05t12:40_9: āha “āvuso mahārakkhita, etassa santike mahāniddesaṁ gaṇhāhī”ti. “Pāpo kirāyaṁ, bhante,
tika-vin05t12:40_10: na gaṇhāmī”ti. “Gaṇhāvuso, ahaṁ te santike nisīdissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante, tumhesu
tika-vin05t12:40_11: nisinnesu gaṇhissāmī”ti paṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṁ nirantaraṁ pariyāpuṇanto osānadivase
tika-vin05t12:40_12: heṭṭhāmañce itthiṁ disvā “bhante, sutaṁyeva me pubbe, sacāhaṁ evaṁ jāneyyaṁ, na īdisassa
tika-vin05t12:40_13: santike dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti āha. Tassa pana santike bahū mahātherā uggaṇhitvā
